title: Bug 7734: System can be shut down without savefile warnings
EB: The system does not provide a "Do you want to save your file" dialog box before shutting down. The shutdown process can be initiated without any warning to the user.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open any application that allows creating or modifying files. 
2. Make changes to the file. 
3. Attempt to shut down the system without saving the file.
